sentences.sContent: ...Many writers obtain inspiration and compose poems and compositions by visiting Mountain Tai...
...Your generous help made it possible that I pass my college entrance examination and obtain the good result...
...Chinese parents also hold that if the child can obtain the big success in the society...

phrases.pCn: 获得信息；索取资料或合同

remMethod.val: ob(附近) ＋ tain(拿住) → 触手可及 → 获得

trans.tranCn: 获得； 通用， 流行； 存在
trans.tranOther: to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work
